name: Arkentower
description:
Protect the tower. Protect the Arkenstone.

Platformer Tower Defense where we protect an old gem by taking resources and activating the old towers. They will only fuel up for ten seconds before turning off again!

Made for the Ludum Dare 51 in roughly 2 days. "Every 10 seconds"

Programmed by Martin Isla and Alex Palottini.
Drawn by Perpetua Franck and Matías Paredes.
Designed by Matías Paredes.
Free of use music and sounds thanks to freesounds.org
